headline.main: 3D STANFORD POLL DISPUTES HOOVER; Ratio of About 6 to 1 Among 341 of Faculty Favors Roosevelt Policy Against Axis

lead_paragraph: PALO ALTO, Calif., Oct. 23 -- A dispute between Herbert Hoover and a faculty committee over the attitude of the Stanford University faculty toward American foreign policy continued today with the announcement of the result of a new poll, showing a ratio of about six to one as favoring "stronger measures" by this government "if they should be needed to defeat the Axis powers."
